resources.string: An artistic rendering of particles inspired by bubble chamber pictures.

Bubble Chamber is written by and Â© 2011 Dan Hulme.\nBased on an original artwork by J. Tarbell of Oct 2003. Find out more about his "bubble chamber" pictures and the algorithm behind them at http://complexification.net/gallery/machines/bubblechamber\nThanks to Matthew Wiggins for the SeekBarPreference class, which is used here under the Apache license 2.0. http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
